SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_PROJECTPHASINGOUT
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to add/delete 'Project on Phasing Out Status' pending reasons
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYELIGIBILITY_PROJECTPHASINGOUT ( @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to be made eligible or pending @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier, -- Used to specify change agent for CHANGEDBYID and ADDEDBYID fields @deletedRows int = 0 output, -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were deleted @insertedRows int = 0 output -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were inserted ) as begin
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @ChangeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @ChangeAgentID output
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @CurrentDate datetime = null set @CurrentDate = getdate()
begin try -- These are required for the sproc to work correctly, so we need to throw an exception if the IDs aren't found
-- This is the pending reason id on the child declare @ProjectPendingID uniqueidentifier select @ProjectPendingID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where UPPER (REASON) = 'PROJECT ON PHASING OUT STATUS' if @ProjectPendingID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Project on Phasing Out Status" Sponsorship Reason'
-- This is the location pending reason id declare @LocationPendingID uniqueidentifier select @LocationPendingID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where upper (REASON) = 'PHASING OUT - CLOSING' and upper (REASONTYPE) = 'LOCATION - MARK INACTIVE' if @LocationPendingID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Couldn''t find the "Phasing out - Closing" reason code of type "Location - Mark Inactive"'
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
-- This needs to be set to off for the output parms to be set properly SET NOCOUNT OFF
-- Remove 'Project on Phasing Out Status' pending reasons if the child's location is no longer Inactive with a reason of 'Phasing out - Closing' delete dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason where -- Find children who are specified to be reviewed and have the 'Project on Phasing Out Status' pending reason exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID ) and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @ProjectPendingID
and not exists (select so.ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation ON slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID where so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID and slocation.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @LocationPendingID)
set @DeletedRows = @@ROWCOUNT
-- Insert 'Project on Phasing Out Status' pending reasons if the child's location is Inactive with a reason of 'Phasing out - Closing' insert dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON (SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, SPONSORSHIPREASONID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED)
select ID, @ProjectPendingID, @ChangeAgentID, @ChangeAgentID, @CurrentDate, @CurrentDate from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child
where exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_child.ID )
-- Verify that the child/children do not already have a 'Project on Pending Status' pending reason and not exists (Select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON so_reason where so_reason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @ProjectPendingID and so_reason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so_child.ID)
and exists (select so.ID from SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation ON slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID where so_child.ID = so.ID and slocation.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @LocationPendingID)
set @InsertedRows = @@ROWCOUNT
end
